articles.title: Apple to hold Worldwide Developers Conference from June 9
articles.content: The event, accesible online, will highlight updates to the software powering iPhones, iPads and other Apple devices, the company said.  Apple said some developers and students will be invited to attend in person at Apple Park on the opening day.  At last year's conference, Apple unveiled a range of AI-enabled features that included new capabilities such as rewriting emails and summarizing a cluttered inbox.

articles.title: Apple Poised to Unveil New Software at June 9 Developers Event
articles.content: (Bloomberg) -- Apple Inc. plans to hold its annual Worldwide Developers Conference during the week of June 9, when it’s expected to announce redesigned iPhone, iPad and Mac operating systems. articles.title: Apple's Siri AI Delay Could Weigh on iPhone Demand, Says UBS
articles.content: UBS expects muted demand as Apple pushes AI improvements to 2026; iPhone upgrade activity remains sluggish

articles.title: Apple’s Worldwide Developers Conference returns the week of June 9
articles.content: CUPERTINO, Calif., March 25, 2025--Apple® today announced it will host its annual Worldwide Developers Conference (WWDC) online from June 9 to 13, 2025. Developers and students will also have the opportunity to celebrate in person during a special event at Apple Park on June 9.
